channel.title: Second UPDATE of New platebody. Arms separated from body. NO NAME. post IDEAS
channel.description: This is the [b]SECOND[/b] updated version i made of my new platebody! I have sorted the problem out with the dodgy arms and removed a few spikes so it looks more normal... [img]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/553/89596771tl3.jpg[/img] READ BEFORE POSTING- if you dont like it please offer constructive critisism not just 'its crap'. ty :) ALSO - could someone make the ints for me because i Know how to but i always muck it up...?
